newsitem.title: USA: Disgruntled employee kills two, self in S. Calif..
newsitem.headline: Disgruntled employee kills two, self in S. Calif..

text.p: An employee who got into an argument with a co-worker at a plastics company pulled out a gun and shot six people Thursday killing two of them, police said.
The gunman escaped in a car and later shot himself in the mouth on a street in Los Angeles, 20 miles (30 km) north of the site of the rampage at the Omni Plastics Co., in suburban Santa Fe Springs.
The gunman, an inspector at the plant, died in the hosital of his wound.

Whittier police spokesman Chuck Drylie said the shooting started after the man got into an argument with a co-worker. He pulled out a pistol and shot the man, then walked through the building calmly shooting at other workers.
One victim was found dead inside the building and five people were taken the hospital with gunshot wounds. One man later died, police said.
Of the other four people wounded, one woman was undergoing surgery and "might not make it", Drylie said.
